name: tm19
effect: Teaches Giga Drain to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Telekinesis to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Giga Drain Gen I: Seismic Toss)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Recovers half the
HP of the damage 
this move inflicts.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Recovers half the
HP of the damage 
this move inflicts.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A harsh attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is easier
to hit for three turns.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is easier
to hit for three turns.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user lands and rests its body. It restores the
user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user lands and rests its body. It restores the
user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user creates a protective field that prevents
status conditions for five turns.
